Package Reservation

Class ReservationCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Controller
      • Reservation.ReservationCtrl
  • public class ReservationCtrl
extends Controller
    A control class that mediates between Reservation entity objects and the ReservationUI boundary object. This control class reads from and writes to a reservations data file.
    Author:
    Hoang Huu Quoc Huy

      • writeData

        public void writeData​(java.io.File file,
                      Reservation rsv)
        Appends data of a specific Reservation object to the end of the reservation data file.
        Parameters:
        file - the destination File to append object data in.
        rsv - the Reservation object to be appended.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the FileWriter object cannot find the reservation data file.

      • readData

        public void readData​(java.io.File file)
        Convert data lines from File object to Reservation which then to be added to the reservations ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        file - the File object that data is converted from.
